category.name: Substance Compliance IMDS Integration
category.category_description: Teamcenter Preferences for Substance Compliance International Material Data System (IMDS) Integration

preference.name: IMDS_optionset_for_exporting_upload_mds_review_status
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default transfer option set to be used when exporting the TC XML file that is generated after the material data sheet review task is completed. A valid value is any internal name of a transfer option set available in the PLM XML Import Export Administration application.
